#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long int T ;
	long long int  N , noOfGroups;
	cin >> T;
	while(T > 0){
		cin >> N;
		noOfGroups = 0;
		while(N != 1){
			noOfGroups += N/2;
			N = N/2 + N % 2;
		}
		cout<< noOfGroups<<"\n";
		T--;
	}
	return 0;
}
